org.pac4j.core.http.ajax

Class DefaultAjaxRequestResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.http.ajax.DefaultAjaxRequestResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpConstants, Pac4jConstants, AjaxRequestResolver

    public class DefaultAjaxRequestResolver
extends Object
implements AjaxRequestResolver, HttpConstants, Pac4jConstants
    Default way to compute if a HTTP request is an AJAX one.
    Since:
    1.8.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
